pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 11, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Rideau Hall for a meeting with Her Excellency the Right Honourable Julie Payette, Governor General of Canada. He will be accompanied by Sophie Gr√©goire Trudeau. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability. 

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 9:10 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Media contact:
    Natalie Babin Dufresne
    Rideau Hall Press Office
    613-993-8158
    mediarelations@gg.ca
